movies.quote: Fasten your seat belts - it's going to be a bumpy night.
movies.author: Margo Channing, All About Eve

movies.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
movies.author: Narrator, Fight Club

movies.quote: This is your life and it's ending one minute at a time.
movies.author: Tagline, Fight Club

television.quote: Most coders think debugging hardware is about fixing a mistake. But that's bullshit.
television.author: Elliot, Mr. Robot

television.quote: The difference between the novice and the master is that the master has failed more times than the novice has tried.
television.author: Koro, Assassination Classroom

television.quote: It is better to be hated for what you are. Than to be loved for what you are not.
television.author: Hachiman Hikigaya, Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU

other.quote: A C program is like a fast dance on a newly waxed dance floor by people carrying razors.
other.author: Waldi Ravens

other.quote: Don’t worry if it doesn’t work right. If everything did, you’d be out of a job.
other.author: Mosher's Law of Software Engineering

other.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
other.author: Linus Torvalds

other.quote: If McDonalds were run like a software company, one out of every hundred Big Macs would give you food poisoning, and the response would be, ‘We’re sorry, here’s a coupon for two more.’
other.author: Mark Minasi
